title: "just build mr against diana lol she wont one shoot you lol lololol she needs to land her q lol"
body:
{{champion:131}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3100}} or {{item:3724}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3020}} 

take {{item:3157}} instead of u dont need {{item:3020}} Makes you even more tanky anyway.

Miss your Q, destroy the enemy laner for 60% of their health with R - AA 

Land your Q, kill him with 2 Rs, because they cant escape you and cant fight back since youre almost as tanky as a fucking Nautilus.

gg fucking bullshit champion

Basically an AP Irelia.
